医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
元旦假期后紧急避孕药销量预计将上升发表在《圣诞节》杂志上的一项研究发现，新年假期后一周，美国紧急避孕药的销量预计将增长约 10%，这表明与其他假期相比，这一时期无保护性行为的风险增加。英国医学杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Sales-of-emergency-contraception-estimated-to-rise-after-the-New-Year-holiday.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Sales-of-emergency-contraception-estimated-to-rise-after-the-New-Year-holiday.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8aeabb56-984c-4430-9e17-de25db9fe456 Fri, 22 Dec 2023 10:19:44 -0500 Sales of emergency contraception estimated to rise after the New Year holiday
小胶质细胞被发现在调节身体对麻醉的反应中发挥关键作用尽管这可能会让每年数百万接受全身麻醉进行医疗手术的人感到惊讶，但不同麻醉剂如何阻碍意识的生物学机制仍不完全清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Microglia-found-to-play-a-key-role-in-regulate-the-bodys-response-to-anesthesia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Microglia-found-to-play-a-key-role-in-regulate-the-bodys-response-to-anesthesia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c49dbc4a-66f1-4294-921a-2f10c1e11f78 Fri, 22 Dec 2023 10:15:56 -0500 Microglia found to play a key role in regulating the body's response to anesthesia
3D打印骨骼：仿生支架为颅骨缺损修复带来希望人体中的颅骨具有非常重要的功能，例如保护大脑并促进对生理功能至关重要的脑神经的通过。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/3D-printed-bone-Biomimetic-scaffolds-offer-hope-for-cranial-defect-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/3D-printed-bone-Biomimetic-scaffolds-offer-hope-for-cranial-defect-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=798e64ed-2e8e-4022-9d00-23aed46af5d1 Fri, 22 Dec 2023 10:11:01 -0500 3D-printed bone: Biomimetic scaffolds offer hope for cranial defect repair
研究：传统 CBT 与暴露疗法治疗纤维肌痛一样有效卡罗林斯卡学院研究人员领导的一项研究表明，所谓的基于暴露的 CBT 和传统 CBT 在治疗纤维肌痛方面似乎没有任何显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Study-Traditional-CBT-as- effective-as-exposure-therapy-for-太多纤维肌痛.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Study-Traditional-CBT-as- effective-as-exposure-therapy-for-太多纤维肌痛.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7252e33b-e3ec-4431-851e-c53bb739aab7 Fri, 22 Dec 2023 09:26:00 -0500 Study: Traditional CBT as effective as exposure therapy for fibromyalgia
通过肠道细菌提高果蝇的产蛋量对于我们许多人来说，当我们想到微生物组时，我们首先想到的可能是生活在我们肠道中的有益微生物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Boosting-egg-product-in-fruit-flies-through-gut-bugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Boosting-egg-product-in-fruit-flies-through-gut-bugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=afa4aaf6-f50c-4d3e-854d-3023f9165127 Fri, 22 Dec 2023 09:06:36 -0500 Boosting egg production in fruit flies through gut bugs
微塑料作为水中的病原体载体构成环境和公共卫生风险微塑料是指尺寸小于 5 毫米的微小塑料颗粒，在全球海洋和淡水生态系统中变得越来越普遍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Micro Plastics-as-pathogen-riers-in-water-pose-environmental-and-public-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Micro Plastics-as-pathogen-riers-in-water-pose-environmental-and-public-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42c89329-d3fe-4aae-90e4-66cfa14af29b Fri, 22 Dec 2023 09:01:52 -0500 Microplastics as pathogen carriers in water pose environmental and public health risks
猴子干细胞变得简单：新方法揭示了无异源、高效的培养系统与其他动物模型相比，非人类灵长类动物（NHP）与人类具有高度相似性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Monkey-stem-cells-made-easy-New-method-unveils-xeno-free-efficient-culture-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Monkey-stem-cells-made-easy-New-method-unveils-xeno-free-efficient-culture-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa1b7a7b-cf32-4a6d-b414-3b85c7aac516 Fri, 22 Dec 2023 08:54:33 -0500 Monkey stem cells made easy: New method unveils xeno-free, efficient culture system
研究表明健身水平的提高与入院率的降低有关保持或增加有氧运动的人未来住院的风险较小，特别是如果他们之前住院过。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Study-links-upgraded-fitness-to-reduced-hospital-admissions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Study-links-upgraded-fitness-to-reduced-hospital-admissions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=128c0f96-2ae7-49ee-8769-8b5593a12f0f Fri, 22 Dec 2023 08:37:20 -0500 Study links upgraded fitness to reduced hospital admissions
研究表明，流动性减少与大流行时期医疗费用增加有关当全世界都在努力应对 COVID-19 大流行带来的封锁和限制时，大阪都立大学的研究人员进行了一项广泛的研究，以阐明人类流动性的变化与与生活方式相关的疾病相关的医疗费用的影响之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Study-links-reduced-movement-to-higher-pandemic-era-medical-bills.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Study-links-reduced-movement-to-higher-pandemic-era-medical-bills.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0f9a679-2b4b-4e27-8c5e-2ede9b7de3a7 Fri, 22 Dec 2023 08:28:23 -0500 Study links reduced movement to higher pandemic-era medical bills
新研究揭穿了颜色对人体生物钟的影响视觉是一个复杂的过程。环境的视觉感知是由不同波长的光组合创建的，这些光在大脑中被解码为颜色和亮度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/New-research-debunks-colors-influence-on-the- human-internal-clock.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/New-research-debunks-colors-influence-on-the- human-internal-clock.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6eb172d-9ce8-4981-aefb-b3f7c5292011 Fri, 22 Dec 2023 07:33:03 -0500 New research debunks color's influence on the human internal clock
